record.id: field.name="init.expr" and file.name="formatctrl" and term=NULL and format.name="formatctrl.maint" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: init.expr
record.file.name: formatctrl
record.format.name: formatctrl.maint

brief.brief: The initial values for variables and fields in this array.
Service Manager uses these expressions in subsequent calculations, or to display values in forms upon initial display.

Service Manager evaluates the initialization expressions each time the form is used either to view a record in Database Manager or to write a record to a report. It evaluates them before evaluating any other Format Control processes against the current record.

detail.detail: This is an array of characters (type 2).
